name: Buildingo: The city builder of a working man
name_original: Buildingo: The city builder of a working man
description:
Hey, you! You like city-builders?
So we may have something for you. An actual city-builder. Like actual, actual, city-builder.
Like as you are THE BUILDER. So grab your hammer, and feel like a proper NPC in a game played by not so competent streamer. 
Hammer on my builder!

CONTROLES:

  • LMB - interact
  • RMB - rotate the camera

This game was developed for Absurd Game Briefs 2022.  Created in 60h by @YerisTR and @Dahlia_Inosensu in Unity.
----
Developed as part of the Briefs series, a gold extra project with additional support by Strange Scaffold.
